net.bramp.ffmpeg.builder

Class FFmpegOutputBuilder

  • java.lang.Object
    • net.bramp.ffmpeg.builder.FFmpegOutputBuilder
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Cloneable

    public class FFmpegOutputBuilder
extends Object
implements Cloneable
    Builds a representation of a single output/encoding setting

      • setVideoFrameRate

        public FFmpegOutputBuilder setVideoFrameRate(int frames,
                                             int per)
        Set the video frame rate in terms of frames per interval. For example 24fps would be 24/1, however NTSC TV at 23.976fps would be 24000 per 1001
        Parameters:
        frames - Number of frames
        per - Number of seconds
        Returns:

        public FFmpegOutputBuilder addMetaTag(String key,
                                      String value)
        Allows to add metadata to output video. Which keys are possible depends on the used output video codec.
        Parameters:
        key - Metadata key, e.g. "comment"
        value - Value to set for key
